entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog at times this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
